snippet: Manufacturing and retail activity were stronger and hiring rose, but energy prices continued to climb, the central bank survey reported.
abstract: Federal Reserve says that the nation's economy continued moderate growth in the late winter months, but rising energy prices are beginning to weigh on manufacturers and retailers.
lead_paragraph: Manufacturing and retail activity were stronger and hiring rose, but energy prices continued to climb, the central bank survey reported.

headline.seo: Economy Continues to Grow Moderately, Fed Reports
headline.main: Economy Continues to Recover Modestly, Fed Reports
headline.print_headline: Economy Continues to Recover Modestly, Fed Reports
